entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Otterburn Park
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:22 AM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -1.6°C

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow at times heavy. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 8 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Snow ending this evening then clearing. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming west 20 gusting to 40 this evening then light overnight. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Increasing cloudiness. High plus 2.
